title: Book 10: The Fizzy Wizard
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 1,200 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 710L, Fiction Series
description: Mike McCarthy is back in another engaging Moneybags Mike story. In The Fizzy Wizard, Mike comes up with a new business idea after being inspired by leftover Easter candy. Will this be the business that finally succeeds? Students will love the colorful illustrations and engaging storyline as they cheer for Mike's newest business venture. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships as well as to make, revise, and confirm predictions to better understand the text.
